DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy AV608 Subjects With Idiopathic Detrusor Overactivity
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled trial evaluate safety efficacy AV608 subject idiopathic detrusor overactivity . Female subject 18 65 year age diagnosis Overactive Bladder Syndrome urodynamic observation involuntary detrusor contraction fill phase eligible trial . Eligible subject complete baseline urodynamic assessment . All subject participate study receive 3 week treatment AV608 placebo . At end treatment period , subject complete second urodynamic assessment .
